title: Mega Man 11
body:
Mega Man 11


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Jump and run, Run and gun, Side, 2D
Company: Capcom
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 1.7 GB
Repack Size: 704 MB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread LATER

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Mega.Man.11-CODEX ISO release: codex-mega.man.11.iso (1,847,099,392 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.7 GB to 704 MB)
  • Installation takes 1-3 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Mega Man is back! The newest entry in this iconic series blends classic, challenging 2D platforming action with a fresh look. The stunning new visual style refreshes the series’ iconic colorfulness, combining hand-drawn environments with detailed, 3D character models.

To save the day, the Blue Bomber must battle Robot Masters and take their powerful weapons for himself, which now changes the hero’s appearance with new levels of detail. The innovative new Double Gear system lets you boost Mega Man’s speed and power for a new twist on the satisfying gameplay the series is known for.

A variety of difficulty modes makes this the perfect opportunity to experience Mega Man for the first time!

Mega Man 11 also features a variety of extra modes including time trials, missions, global leaderboards, a gallery of concept art, and more!

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with my previous repack of MM11. You can rehash fg-01.bin to save 693 MB of traffic.
